nodes.objective:
Send the entire personalized feedback to tenant channel.

The body of the email needs o be HTML to ensure line breaks and formatting

toolConfiguration.description: Send an email to one or more recipients.

inputParams.outputExample:
URGENT - EMERGENCY

There is a major water leak in our office!

Details:
- Company: Tech Startup Inc. (TNT-006)
- Property: Roppongi Business Plaza
- Unit: F-1201
- Location: Bathroom/kitchenette area ceiling
- Severity: Water pouring through ceiling, flooding office space

The water started about 20 minutes ago (7:10 AM). It appears to be coming from the unit above us or the building pipes. We've placed buckets and towels, but it's still flooding heavily.

We've turned off the water valve in our unit, but the leak continues - the source must be external to our unit.

THIS NEEDS IMMEDIATE ATTENTION:
- Risk of electrical damage to our office equipment
- Water is damaging computers and servers
- Our team cannot work in these conditions

Please send emergency maintenance RIGHT NOW.

Contact Information:
- Company: Tech Startup Inc.
- Contact: Office Manager
- Phone: +81-3-6666-7777
- Email: office@techstartup.co.jp

We have staff on-site right now and can provide access immediately.

This is affecting our business operations. Please treat as urgent priority.

Tech Startup Inc.
Unit F-1201, Roppongi Business Plaza
inputParams.paramDescription: HTML or markdown content of the email
Comma-separated recipient email addresses

inputParams.outputExample: EMERGENCY - Water Leak in Unit F-1201
inputParams.paramDescription: Subject line of the email
Comma-separated BCC recipient email addresses
Comma-separated CC recipient email addresses
Display name shown as the sender
Email address where replies should be directed
If true, replies go only to the original sender

originalTool.description: Send an email to one or more recipients.

nodes.objective: Generate tailored responses for each tenant based on their specific inquiry, and tenant profile
evaluationCriteria: The 'tenant_profile // A unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit' field The 'tenant_profile' field must contain an object with all required subfields (e.g., tenant_name, contact_information, inquiry_details) populated with non-empty values, ensuring that no subfield is missing or contains null values.

toolConfiguration.description: The Tenant Response Generator is designed to create personalized responses for each tenant based on their specific inquiry and tenant profile. It analyzes tenant profiles to understand their needs and concerns, ensuring that responses are tailored to the tenant's specific context and requirements. The tool synthesizes information from various sources to create comprehensive tenant profiles, maintaining data integrity and providing well-informed responses. It is crucial for enhancing tenant satisfaction and improving communication efficiency. The tool facilitates effective communication and resolution by providing accurate and relevant responses.

inputParams.paramDescription: A unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit.

outputParams.paramDescription: A unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit.
outputParams.outputExample: {"records":[{"id":"recNFXr36WYytNOpP","fields":{"notes":"Tenant reported slow draining kitchen sink and questioned a maintenance bill. Photos attached. Plumber visit needed.","status":"Open","channel":"Email","subject":"Maintenance Issue and Billing Inquiry","tenant_id":"TNT-001","timestamp":"2025-10-17T03:25:34.000Z","assigned_to":"Sato Kenji","cost_amount":28500,"response_sent":"In Progress","issue_category":"Plumbing","priority_level":"Urgent","attachment_info":"Sample Maintenance Invoice - INV-2024-09-1547.pdf","communication_id":"COM-001","issue_description":"I am writing to report a maintenance issue in my unit and to inquire about the recent bill I received. First, regarding the maintenance issue: For the past three days, the kitchen sink in Unit A-305 has been draining very slowly. Water pools in the sink and takes about 10-15 minutes to drain completely. I've tried using a plunger but the problem persists. I'm worried this might be a larger plumbing issue in the pipes. I've attached two photos showing the water pooling situation. Second, I received a maintenance bill yesterday (attached) for ¥28,500 related to work done last month. However, I don't recall requesting any maintenance work in September. Could you please clarify what this bill is for? The invoice mentions 'Emergency bathroom repair - September 15' but I didn't report any bathroom issues at that time.","communication_type":"Maintenance Request"},"created_time":"2025-10-17T03:36:07.000Z"}],"tenant_info":{"name":"Tanaka Yuki","unit":"A-305","phone":"+81-90-1234-5678","address":"1-8-1 Shibuya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0002","building":"Shibuya Tower East","tenant_id":"TNT-001","risk_level":"Low","tenant_type":"Individual","contact_email":"y.tanaka@email.com","lease_end_date":"2025-03-31","payment_status":"Current","account_manager":"Sato Kenji","lease_start_date":"2023-04-01","last_contact_date":"2024-10-10","preferred_language":"English","tenant_since_duration":"19 months"},"priority_level":"Urgent","communication_type":"Maintenance Request and Billing Inquiry"}

originalTool.prompt:
## Role
You are a tenant response specialist, tasked with generating personalized responses for each tenant based on their specific inquiry and tenant profile. Your expertise lies in understanding tenant needs and providing tailored solutions. You must ensure that each response is accurate, relevant, and addresses the tenant's concerns. Your role involves synthesizing information from various sources to create comprehensive tenant profiles. You are responsible for maintaining data integrity and ensuring that all responses are well-informed and contextually appropriate. Your attention to detail and ability to analyze tenant profiles are crucial for fulfilling the task objective.

---

## Objective
The objective is to generate tailored responses for each tenant based on their specific inquiry and tenant profile. This involves analyzing tenant profiles to understand their needs and concerns. The responses must be personalized, addressing the tenant's specific context and requirements. The objective is to ensure that each tenant receives a response that is relevant and accurate. This requires synthesizing information from multiple sources to create comprehensive tenant profiles. The objective is to maintain data integrity and provide well-informed responses that facilitate effective communication and resolution. The task is crucial for enhancing tenant satisfaction and improving communication efficiency.

---

## Task
Your task is to generate personalized responses for each tenant based on their specific inquiry and tenant profile. You must analyze the tenant profile to understand their needs and concerns. The responses should be tailored to the tenant's specific context and requirements. You are responsible for ensuring that each response is accurate, relevant, and addresses the tenant's concerns. Your task involves synthesizing information from various sources to create comprehensive tenant profiles. You must maintain data integrity and provide well-informed responses that facilitate effective communication and resolution. Your attention to detail and ability to analyze tenant profiles are crucial for fulfilling the task objective.

---

## Parameter Context
@TenantProfile:
A unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit.
```
{tenant_profile}
```
@EndTenantProfile

---

## Instruction
- Analyze the tenant profile to understand their specific needs and concerns.
- Generate personalized responses that address the tenant's inquiry and context.
- Ensure that each response is accurate, relevant, and well-informed.
- Maintain data integrity and provide responses that facilitate effective communication.
- Synthesize information from various sources to create comprehensive tenant profiles.

---

## Data Continuity Directive
Ensure that all information and data fields are retained throughout the process. Maintain data integrity and accuracy in all responses.

---

## Rules And Constraints
- Responses must be tailored to the tenant's specific inquiry and profile.
- Ensure data integrity and accuracy in all responses.
- Maintain confidentiality and respect tenant privacy.
- Avoid generating new information or inferring details not present in the tenant profile.
- Responses should be well-informed and contextually appropriate.

---

## Expected Output
The expected output is a set of personalized responses for each tenant based on their specific inquiry and tenant profile. The responses should be accurate, relevant, and address the tenant's concerns. They must be well-informed and contextually appropriate, facilitating effective communication and resolution.

---

It analyzes tenant profiles to understand their needs and concerns, ensuring that responses are tailored to the tenant's specific context and requirements. The tool synthesizes information from various sources to create comprehensive tenant profiles, maintaining data integrity and providing well-informed responses. It is crucial for enhancing tenant satisfaction and improving communication efficiency. The tool facilitates effective communication and resolution by providing accurate and relevant responses.

outputParams.paramDescription: A unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit.

nodes.objective: Aggregate all information related to a specific tenant or property unit from multiple communications and create a unified tenant profile/issue summary. This would involve combining the information from airtable and the extracted info from the documents
evaluationCriteria: The 'tenant_profile' field The 'tenant_profile' field must be an object containing all relevant tenant information and issue summaries, with no missing data fields, and must include data from both Airtable and extracted documents. The profile should be structured with clearly defined sections for tenant details, communication history, and priority issues, ensuring that all information is presented in a clear and concise manner.

toolConfiguration.description: The Tenant Profile Aggregator is a tool designed to aggregate all information related to a specific tenant or property unit from multiple communications. It combines data from Airtable and extracted information from documents to create a unified tenant profile or issue summary. The tool ensures data integrity and accuracy while synthesizing information from various sources. It provides a comprehensive overview of tenant information and issues, facilitating decision-making and further analysis. The tool is essential for creating detailed profiles that enable effective management and resolution.

inputParams.paramDescription: Identified communication type
Determined priority level
Extracted tenant information

outputParams.paramDescription: A unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit.
outputParams.outputExample: {"tenant_info":"Name: Tanaka Yuki, Unit: A-305, Building: Shibuya Tower East, Phone: +81-90-1234-5678, Tenant ID: TNT-001, Address: 1-8-1 Shibuya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo 150-0002, Lease Start Date: 2023-04-01, Lease End Date: 2025-03-31, Contact Email: y.tanaka@email.com, Tenant Type: Individual, Payment Status: Current, Preferred Language: English, Account Manager: Sato Kenji, Tenant Since Duration: 19 months, Risk Level: Low, Last Contact Date: 2024-10-10","priority_level":"Urgent","communication_type":"Maintenance Request and Billing Inquiry"}

originalTool.prompt:
## Role
You are an expert data aggregator, specializing in combining information from multiple sources to create comprehensive profiles. Your role involves ensuring data integrity and accuracy while synthesizing information from communications and databases. You are skilled at identifying key data points and integrating them into a unified summary. Your expertise lies in maintaining data continuity and providing clear, actionable insights. You are responsible for creating detailed profiles that facilitate decision-making and further analysis. Your attention to detail ensures that no data field is lost or misrepresented. You are adept at working with complex data sets and extracting meaningful information.

---

## Objective
The objective is to aggregate all information related to a specific tenant or property unit from multiple communications and create a unified tenant profile or issue summary. This involves combining data from Airtable and extracted information from documents to provide a comprehensive overview. The goal is to ensure that all relevant information is captured accurately and presented in a clear, concise manner. The task requires synthesizing data from various sources to create a detailed profile that facilitates decision-making. The objective is to provide a complete picture of tenant information and issues, enabling effective management and resolution. The task involves maintaining data integrity and ensuring that no information is lost during the aggregation process. The objective is to create a profile that is both comprehensive and actionable.

---

## Task
Your task is to aggregate all information related to a specific tenant or property unit from multiple communications and create a unified tenant profile or issue summary. This involves combining data from Airtable and extracted information from documents. You must ensure that all relevant information is captured accurately and presented in a clear, concise manner. The task requires synthesizing data from various sources to create a detailed profile that facilitates decision-making. You must maintain data integrity and ensure that no information is lost during the aggregation process. The task involves creating a profile that is both comprehensive and actionable. You must provide a complete picture of tenant information and issues, enabling effective management and resolution.

---

## Parameter Context
@TenantInfo:
Extracted tenant information
```
{tenant_info}
```
@EndTenantInfo
@CommunicationType:
Identified communication type
```
{communication_type}
```
@EndCommunicationType
@PriorityLevel:
Determined priority level
```
{priority_level}
```
@EndPriorityLevel

---

## Instruction
- Aggregate all information related to a specific tenant or property unit from multiple communications.
- Combine data from Airtable and extracted information from documents.
- Ensure that all relevant information is captured accurately and presented in a clear, concise manner.
- Maintain data integrity and ensure that no information is lost during the aggregation process.
- Create a profile that is both comprehensive and actionable.
- Provide a complete picture of tenant information and issues, enabling effective management and resolution.

---

## Data Continuity Directive
Ensure that all data fields are retained and not lost during the aggregation process. Maintain data integrity and accuracy throughout the task.

---

## Rules And Constraints
- Ensure data integrity and accuracy while aggregating information.
- Maintain continuity of data fields throughout the process.
- Do not lose any information during the aggregation process.
- Ensure that the final profile is comprehensive and actionable.
- Capture all relevant information accurately and present it clearly.

---

## Expected Output
The expected output is a unified tenant profile or issue summary that aggregates all information related to a specific tenant or property unit. The profile should combine data from Airtable and extracted information from documents, providing a comprehensive overview. The output should be clear, concise, and actionable, facilitating decision-making and further analysis. The profile should maintain data integrity and ensure that no information is lost during the aggregation process. The output should provide a complete picture of tenant information and issues, enabling effective management and resolution.

---

It provides a comprehensive overview of tenant information and issues, facilitating decision-making and further analysis. The tool is essential for creating detailed profiles that enable effective management and resolution.

nodes.objective:
Send email to internal team member for manually handle this usecaase as the details of the customer are not found in the database.

Make sure the body of the email also contiains available core details of the customer as well.

The body of the email should be in HTML format so that line breaks and formatting can be preserved

toolConfiguration.description: Send an email to one or more recipients.

inputParams.outputExample:
Hello Team,

Please handle the following customer inquiry manually as the details are not found in the database.

Customer Details:

  • Name: Yamada Kenji
  • Company: New Business Ventures KK
  • Email: prospect@newbusiness.jp
  • Phone: +81-90-9999-8888
  • Requirements: Office space for 10-15 employees, available February or March 2026, Roppongi or Shibuya area, budget up to ¥500,000/month

Best regards,
inputParams.paramDescription: HTML or markdown content of the email
Comma-separated BCC recipient email addresses
Comma-separated CC recipient email addresses
Display name shown as the sender
Email address where replies should be directed
If true, replies go only to the original sender
Comma-separated recipient email addresses
Property Management Customer Support

originalTool.description: Retrieves records from an Airtable table, with optional filtering by field values.

meta.content: AirtableAction_GetRecords: Retrieve records from Airtable table with optional filtering by field values.
meta.description: Fetch records from an Airtable table, optionally filtering by a JSON object of field:value pairs (e.g., {"Status":"Active"}).
optional_extracted_args: filter: object // The field filter array, found in Airtable API responses or user input and formatted as a JSON string or object (e.g., ``{"Status":"Active"}``).
required_extracted_args: base_id: string // The Airtable base ID, found in Airtable API lookups or previous node outputs and formatted as provider ID (e.g., ``app123ABC``).
table: string // The table name or ID, found in Airtable base configuration or previous node outputs and formatted as a string (e.g., ``Contacts``).
meta.description_human_readable: Retrieves records from an Airtable table, with optional filtering by field values.

inputParams.paramTip: The base id used to reference records in Airtable (e.g., app123ABC)
inputParams.paramDescription: The Airtable base ID, found in Airtable API lookups or previous node outputs and formatted as provider ID (e.g., ``app123ABC``).

inputParams.paramTip: The table used in Airtable (e.g., Contacts)
inputParams.paramDescription: The table name or ID, found in Airtable base configuration or previous node outputs and formatted as a string (e.g., ``Contacts``).
The field filter array, found in Airtable API responses or user input and formatted as a JSON string or object (e.g., ``{"Status":"Active"}``).

toolConfiguration.description: Creates new record(s) in an Airtable table with specified field values.

inputParams.outputExample: {"{\"Communication ID\":\"COM-001\",\"Tenant ID\":\"TNT-006\",\"Timestamp\":\"2026-01-06T07:30:00\",\"Communication Type\":\"Maintenance Request\",\"Issue Category\":\"Plumbing\",\"Channel\":\"Email\",\"Subject\":\"EMERGENCY - Water Leak in Unit F-1201\",\"Issue Description\":\"URGENT - EMERGENCY\\n\\nThere is a major water leak in our office!\\n\\n**Details**:\\n- Company: Tech Startup Inc. (TNT-006)\\n- Property: Roppongi Business Plaza\\n- Unit: F-1201\\n- Location: Bathroom/kitchenette area ceiling\\n- Severity: Water pouring through ceiling, flooding office space\\n\\nThe water started about 20 minutes ago (7:10 AM). It appears to be coming from the unit above us or the building pipes. We've placed buckets and towels, but it's still flooding heavily.\\n\\nWe've turned off the water valve in our unit, but the leak continues - the source must be external to our unit.\\n\\nTHIS NEEDS IMMEDIATE ATTENTION:\\n- Risk of electrical damage to our office equipment\\n- Water is damaging computers and servers\\n- Our team cannot work in these conditions\\n\\nPlease send emergency maintenance RIGHT NOW.\\n\\nContact Information:\\n- Company: Tech Startup Inc.\\n- Contact: Office Manager\\n- Phone: +81-3-6666-7777\\n- Email: office@techstartup.co.jp\\n\\n**We have staff on-site right now and can provide access immediately.**\\n\\nThis is affecting our business operations. Please treat as urgent priority.\\n\\nTech Startup Inc.\\nUnit F-1201, Roppongi Business Plaza\\n\\n\",\"Attachment Info\":\"\",\"Priority Level\":\"Urgent\",\"Status\":\"Open\",\"Response Sent\":\"In Progress\",\"Assigned To\":\"\",\"Cost Amount\":null,\"Notes\":\"\"}"}
inputParams.paramDescription:
[
  {
    "Communication ID": "[Generate unique identifier in format COM-XXX where XXX is a sequential number]",
    "Tenant ID": "[Insert the Tenant ID from Tenant Master Information table that matches this communication's tenant]",
    "Timestamp": "[Insert the date and time when the communication was received in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss]",
    "Communication Type": "[Select ONE from: Maintenance Request, Inquiry, Complaint, Contract Renewal, Invoice, Bill, General]",
    "Issue Category": "[Select ONE from: Plumbing, Electrical, HVAC, Appliance, Structural, Payment, Contract, Parking, Noise, Other]",
    "Channel": "[Select ONE from: Email, Phone, Portal, In-person]",
    "Subject": "[Insert the subject line or brief title of the communication]",
    "Issue Description": "[Insert the full detailed description of the issue, request, or inquiry as provided by the tenant in their communication]",
    "Attachment Info": "[Insert comma-separated list of attachment filenames if any were included, e.g., 'photo_001.jpg, invoice.pdf'. Leave blank if no attachments]",
    "Priority Level": "[Select ONE from: Urgent, Normal, Low based on the severity and time-sensitivity of the issue]",
    "Status": "[Select ONE from: Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed based on current state of the communication]",
    "Response Sent": "In Progress",
    "Assigned To": "[Insert the name of the person, team, or contractor responsible for handling this communication, e.g., 'Sato Kenji', 'Tokyo HVAC Solutions', 'Accounting Department']",
    "Cost Amount": [Insert the cost amount in EUR as a number without currency symbol if there are costs associated with this communication, e.g., 15000. Leave blank if no costs. Do not make this a string. leave as integer],
    "Notes": "[Insert internal notes, updates, or comments about how this communication was handled, current status, or any follow-up actions needed]"
  }
]
Airtable base ID (e.g., "app123ABC")
Table name or ID (e.g., "Contacts")

{"Communication ID":"COM-001","Tenant ID":"TNT-006","Timestamp":"2026-01-05T22:30:00.000Z","Communication Type":"Maintenance Request","Issue Category":"Plumbing","Channel":"Email","Subject":"EMERGENCY - Water Leak in Unit F-1201","Issue Description":"URGENT - EMERGENCY

There is a major water leak in our office!

**Details**:
- Company: Tech Startup Inc. (TNT-006)
- Property: Roppongi Business Plaza
- Unit: F-1201
- Location: Bathroom/kitchenette area ceiling
- Severity: Water pouring through ceiling, flooding office space

The water started about 20 minutes ago (7:10 AM). It appears to be coming from the unit above us or the building pipes. We've placed buckets and towels, but it's still flooding heavily.

We've turned off the water valve in our unit, but the leak continues - the source must be external to our unit.

THIS NEEDS IMMEDIATE ATTENTION:
- Risk of electrical damage to our office equipment
- Water is damaging computers and servers
- Our team cannot work in these conditions

Please send emergency maintenance RIGHT NOW.

Contact Information:
- Company: Tech Startup Inc.
- Contact: Office Manager
- Phone: +81-3-6666-7777
- Email: office@techstartup.co.jp

**We have staff on-site right now and can provide access immediately.**

This is affecting our business operations. Please treat as urgent priority.

Tech Startup Inc.
Unit F-1201, Roppongi Business Plaza

originalTool.description: Creates new record(s) in an Airtable table with specified field values.

meta.content: AirtableAction_RecordCreate: Create one or multiple new records in an Airtable table with specified field values.
meta.description: Create one or more records in an Airtable table by supplying a JSON array or object of field:value pairs (e.g., [{"Name":"Jane"}]).
required_extracted_args: base_id: string // The Airtable base ID, found in Airtable API lookups or previous node outputs and formatted as provider ID (e.g., ``app123ABC``).
table: string // The table name or ID, found in Airtable base configuration or previous node outputs and formatted as a string (e.g., ``Contacts``).
records: string // The record data, found in Airtable API responses or user input and formatted as a JSON string or object (e.g., ``'[{"Name":"Jane"}]'``).
meta.description_human_readable: Creates new record(s) in an Airtable table with specified field values.

inputParams.paramTip: The base id used to reference records in Airtable (e.g., app123ABC)
inputParams.paramDescription: The Airtable base ID, found in Airtable API lookups or previous node outputs and formatted as provider ID (e.g., ``app123ABC``).

inputParams.paramTip: The table used in Airtable (e.g., Contacts)
inputParams.paramDescription: The table name or ID, found in Airtable base configuration or previous node outputs and formatted as a string (e.g., ``Contacts``).
The record data, found in Airtable API responses or user input and formatted as a JSON string or object (e.g., ``'[{"Name":"Jane"}]'``).

nodes.objective: Analyze incoming communication to identify tenant information, communication type, priority level, and extract structured data from unstructured text
evaluationCriteria: The 'tenant_info // Extracted tenant information' field The 'tenant_info' field must contain a non-empty string that accurately reflects the tenant's name or identifier, extracted from the communication text, with no extraneous characters or missing components.

The 'communication_type // Identified communication type' field The 'communication_type' field must contain a string that matches one of the predefined categories (e.g., 'email', 'phone call', 'text message'), ensuring that the type is correctly identified and categorized based on the content and context of the communication.

The 'priority_level // Determined priority level' field The 'priority_level' field must contain a string representing one of the predefined priority levels (e.g., 'high', 'medium', 'low'), determined based on keywords and context within the communication text, with no ambiguity or misclassification.

toolConfiguration.description: This tool analyzes incoming communications to extract structured data. It identifies tenant information, communication type, and priority level from unstructured text. The tool ensures that all relevant information is captured accurately. It maintains data integrity and provides clear and concise output. The tool is crucial for decision-making and further analysis in the agent graph.

originalTool.prompt:
## Role
You are an expert in analyzing communications to extract structured data. Your role involves identifying tenant information, communication type, and priority level from unstructured text. You must ensure that all relevant information is captured accurately. Your expertise in data extraction and analysis is crucial for this task. You are responsible for maintaining data integrity and ensuring that no fields are lost. Your role requires attention to detail and precision in data processing. You must provide clear and concise output that aligns with the task objective.

---

## Objective
The objective is to analyze incoming communications to extract structured data. This involves identifying tenant information, communication type, and priority level from unstructured text. The task requires processing the text to capture all relevant information accurately. The objective is to ensure that the extracted data is structured and ready for further processing. The task is crucial for decision-making and further analysis in the agent graph. The objective requires attention to detail and precision in data extraction. The task must be completed without losing any data fields.

---

## Task
Your task is to analyze incoming communications to extract structured data. You must identify tenant information, communication type, and priority level from unstructured text. The task requires processing the text to capture all relevant information accurately. You must ensure that the extracted data is structured and ready for further processing. The task is crucial for decision-making and further analysis in the agent graph. You must maintain data integrity and ensure that no fields are lost. The task requires attention to detail and precision in data extraction.

---

## Parameter Context
@InitialData:
All necessary fields for processing
```
{initial_data}
```
@EndInitialData

---

## Instruction
- Analyze incoming communications to extract structured data.
- Identify tenant information, communication type, and priority level from unstructured text.
- Ensure that all relevant information is captured accurately.
- Maintain data integrity and ensure that no fields are lost.
- Provide clear and concise output that aligns with the task objective.

---

## Data Continuity Directive
Ensure that the information and data field retain and not missed. Give proper instructions and guidelines.

---

## Rules And Constraints
- Do not lose any data fields during extraction.
- Ensure that all relevant information is captured accurately.
- Maintain data integrity throughout the process.
- Provide clear and concise output that aligns with the task objective.

---
